name: Force of Nature
description: The game is a P2E and multiplayer and will also let you play vs. AI to sharpen your skills before your friends see you on the PvP-battlefield. FON will be bringing forth a P2E Game, Staking Platform and Suite of NFTs. Alongside Mr Bapple — the boxing apple, you’ll be able to play with and against many other characters. Hand-DrawnCharacters Each and every character, or Fruitarrior and Vegelante has been hand-drawn on a piece of paper, later made into digital 2D art and then 3D for the game.
